name: PENITENCE (oktoberlove)
description:
Okto, Julia and Locke are best friends. Best friends...with a secret. After Okto continues to dream of a mysterious manor, he seeks out a psychic who tells him he must travel there with his friends in order to lay his mind to rest. But it won't be easy. Sometimes the hardest tasks come from within. Can they unravel the secrets of the manor while protecting their own? Or are some secrets just too dark to stay in the shadows? 

THIS GAME WAS WRITTEN AND DEVELOPED FOR THE 2020 SGB GAMEJAM
